[view all news](https://www.sweenytx.gov/newslist.php)


City offices will be closed on Monday, January 26th, 2026 due to inclement weather. Essential personnel will remain active and on-duty.

The City will continue to monitor conditions and communicate updates as needed.

For any city related issues, to include water and/or gas leaks, please contact Public Works at 979 429 6171.

![freezing weather update (1) - Copy](https://www.sweenytx.gov/newsimages/freezing%20weather%20update%20(1)%20-%20Copy.jpg?t=202601231534060)



Due to recent developments involving the Sweeny Fire Department, the attached statement has been issued by Mayor Hopkins on behalf of the City of Sweeny.
[OFFICIAL STATEMENT](https://www.sweenytx.gov/newsimages/Official%20Statement%2001232026.pdf?t=202601231645270)

City Hall Information
---------------------

102 W. Ashley Wilson Rd
P.O. Box 248
Sweeny, TX 77480
Phone: (979) 548-3321
After Hours Public Works On Call Personnel- (979) 429-6171
Email:
[info@sweenytx.gov](https://sweenytx.gov/contact-us/)
[Get Directions](https://goo.gl/maps/Z4qrsxwC8f82)
Hours of Operation
Monday- Friday 8:30 AM - 4:30 PM

For emergencies, please call 911 or Dispatch at 979 548 3111.
For after hours City related issues or to report a gas leak, call our Public Works on call personnel at 979 429 6171.
